      • checkParticle

        protected boolean checkParticle(DLAParticle p)
        Checks if the given particle is close to an existing one or a curve. If so, the particle is attached based on the current DLA parameters and the method return true.
        Parameters:
        p -
        Returns:
        true, if particle attached.
